info.title: Context-Aware Translation System
info.description: AI-powered literary translation service with context awareness

get.description:
List all translation jobs for the current user.

Args:
    skip: Number of jobs to skip for pagination
    limit: Maximum number of jobs to return
    user: Current authenticated user
    service: Translation domain service
    
Returns:
    List of translation jobs

schema.title: Response List Jobs Api V1 Jobs Get

post.description:
Create a new translation job.

Args:
    file: File to translate
    api_key: API key for translation service
    model_name: Default model name
    translation_model_name: Optional override for translation model
    style_model_name: Optional override for style model
    glossary_model_name: Optional override for glossary model
    style_data: Optional style data
    glossary_data: Optional glossary data
    segment_size: Segment size for translation
    enable_validation: Whether to run validation automatically after translation
    quick_validation: Whether to use quick validation mode
    validation_sample_rate: Portion of segments to validate (0.0-1.0)
    enable_post_edit: Whether to run post-edit automatically after validation
    user: Current authenticated user
    service: Translation domain service
    
Returns:
    Created translation job

get.description:
Get a translation job by ID.

Args:
    job_id: Job ID
    service: Translation domain service
    
Returns:
    Translation job

delete.description:
Delete a translation job.

Args:
    job_id: Job ID to delete
    user: Current authenticated user
    service: Translation domain service
    
Returns:
    204 No Content response

get.description:
Get the complete content of a translation job.

Args:
    job_id: Job ID
    service: Translation domain service
    
Returns:
    Dict containing the job content and segments

schema.title: Response Get Job Content Api V1 Jobs  Job Id  Content Get

get.description:
Get segments from a translation job with pagination.

Args:
    job_id: Job ID
    offset: Number of segments to skip
    limit: Maximum number of segments to return
    service: Translation domain service
    
Returns:
    Dict containing paginated segments

schema.title: Response Get Job Segments Api V1 Jobs  Job Id  Segments Get

post.description:
Trigger validation on a completed translation job.

Args:
    job_id: Job ID
    request: Validation request parameters
    user: Current authenticated user
    db: Database session
    
Returns:
    Task information for the validation job

get.description:
Get the validation report for a job.

Args:
    job_id: Job ID
    structured: Whether to return structured response
    user: Current authenticated user
    db: Database session
    
Returns:
    Validation report (structured or plain)

post.description:
Trigger post-editing on a validated translation job.

Args:
    job_id: Job ID
    request: Post-edit request parameters
    user: Current authenticated user
Returns:
    Task information for the post-edit job

get.description:
Get the post-edit report for a job.

Args:
    job_id: Job ID
    user: Current authenticated user
Returns:
    Post-edit report with changes and statistics

Download the output of a translation job.

Args:
    job_id: Job ID
    user: Current authenticated user (from dependency)
    db: Database session (from dependency)
    
Returns:
    FileResponse with the translated file

post.description:
Export translation job in different formats.

Args:
    job_id: Job ID
    format: Export format (pdf, etc.)
    include_source: Whether to include source text
    include_illustrations: Whether to include illustrations
    page_size: Page size format
    user: Current authenticated user (from dependency)
    db: Database session (from dependency)
    
Returns:
    Response with exported file

Analyze the narrative style of a document.

Args:
    file: Uploaded file to analyze
    api_key: API key for the AI model
    model_name: Model to use for analysis
    
Returns:
    StyleAnalysisResponse with analysis results

Extract glossary terms from a document.

Args:
    file: Uploaded file to analyze
    api_key: API key for the AI model
    model_name: Model to use for analysis
    
Returns:
    GlossaryAnalysisResponse with extracted terms

Analyze characters in a document.

Args:
    file: Uploaded file to analyze
    api_key: API key for the AI model
    model_name: Model to use for analysis
    
Returns:
    CharacterAnalysisResponse with character analysis results

Generate illustration prompts for a translation job.

This endpoint triggers generation of detailed illustration prompts for all or selected segments
of a completed translation job. The prompts can then be used with image generation services
like DALL-E, Midjourney, or Stable Diffusion to create actual illustrations.

Expects JSON body with:
- config: IllustrationConfig object
- api_key: API key for Gemini
- max_illustrations: Optional maximum number of illustrations
Generate base character images (3 variations) focusing only on appearance.

Analyze early novel text to produce appearance-only prompt candidates for the protagonist.

Expects JSON body with:
- api_key: API key for model
- protagonist_name: Optional protagonist name
- model_name: Model name for analysis (default: gemini-2.5-flash)

Generate base image(s) directly from provided prompt text(s).
Accepts either JSON body with { prompts: string[] } or multipart with prompts_json/prompt.

get.description: Get generated base character images and current selection.
Get a specific base asset (image if available, otherwise prompt JSON).

post.description: Select one of the generated base images by index.

get.description:
Get the illustration generation status for a translation job.

Returns lightweight status information without loading all illustration data.

Get all illustration prompts for a translation job.

Returns metadata about all generated illustration prompts for the specified job.
These prompts can be used with external image generation services.

Get the illustration for a specific segment.

Returns the generated image if available, otherwise returns the prompt JSON file.

delete.description:
Delete a specific illustration and its prompt.

Removes both the image file (if exists) and prompt file, and updates the job metadata.

post.description:
Regenerate an illustration prompt for a specific segment.

This allows regenerating a single illustration prompt with optional new style hints.

Expects JSON body with:
- api_key: API key for Gemini
- style_hints: Optional style hints for regeneration

get.description:
Get the status of a specific task.

Returns both database tracking info and real-time Celery status.

List tasks with optional filters.

- Users can see their own tasks
- Admins can see all tasks
- Anonymous users can't see any tasks

post.description:
Cancel a running task.

Only the task owner or an admin can cancel a task.

get.description: Get all tasks associated with a specific job.

schema.title: Response Get Job Tasks Api V1 Tasks Job  Job Id  Tasks Get

get.description:
Get task execution statistics.

Admin only endpoint.

parameters.name: hours

schema.description: Number of hours to look back
schema.title: Hours

parameters.description: Number of hours to look back

get.description: Get posts with filtering and pagination.

schema.title: Response List Posts Api V1 Community Posts Get

post.description: Create a new post.

get.description: Return all community categories.

schema.title: Response List Categories Api V1 Community Categories Get

post.description: Create a new category (admin only).

get.description: Return categories with aggregated statistics and recent posts.

schema.title: Response List Categories Overview Api V1 Community Categories Overview Get

get.description: Get a specific post with comments.

post.description: Increment the view count for a post.

get.description: Get comments for a specific post.

schema.title: Response List Post Comments Api V1 Community Posts  Post Id  Comments Get

post.description: Create a comment on a post.
Handle community image uploads.

get.description: Get a specific category.
Get announcements with optional filtering.

schema.title: Response List Announcements Api V1 Community Announcements Get

post.description: Create a new announcement (admin only).

get.description: Stream announcements via Server-Sent Events (SSE).
Get the current user's profile.
Return the authenticated user's token usage summary.

Get all core JSON schemas used in structured output.

Returns a dictionary mapping schema names to their JSON schema definitions.
These schemas are used by Gemini's structured output feature.

schema.title: Response Get Core Schemas Api V1 Schemas Core Get

get.description:
Get a specific core JSON schema by name.

Args:
    schema_name: Name of the schema to retrieve
    
Returns:
    The JSON schema definition for the specified schema
    
Raises:
    404 if schema not found

schema.title: Response Get Core Schema Api V1 Schemas Core  Schema Name  Get

get.description:
Get all backend API schemas (DTOs).

Returns schemas used in FastAPI endpoints for request/response models.

schema.title: Response Get Backend Schemas Api V1 Schemas Backend Get

get.description: Health check endpoint.

AuthorSummary.title: AuthorSummary
AuthorSummary.description: Minimal author information for community content.

num_variations.title: Num Variations
num_variations.description: How many variants to generate when a single prompt is provided

CategoryOverview.title: CategoryOverview
CategoryOverview.description: Extended category information for overview responses.

character_name.title: Character Name
character_name.description: Name of the character the protagonist is speaking to

speech_style.title: Speech Style
speech_style.description: Korean speech style used ( for informal,  for polite informal,  for formal)

CharacterInteraction.title: CharacterInteraction
CharacterInteraction.description: Single interaction between protagonist and another character.

interactions.title: Interactions
interactions.description: List of character interactions found in this segment

has_dialogue.title: Has Dialogue
has_dialogue.description: Whether the protagonist has any dialogue in this segment

DialogueAnalysisResult.title: DialogueAnalysisResult
DialogueAnalysisResult.description: Result of dialogue style analysis for a text segment.

terms.title: Terms
terms.description: List of unique proper nouns found in the text. Empty list if none found.

ExtractedTerms.title: ExtractedTerms
ExtractedTerms.description: Response model for proper noun extraction.

GlossaryAnalysisResponse.title: GlossaryAnalysisResponse
GlossaryAnalysisResponse.description: Response for glossary analysis using core schemas

description.title: Description
description.description: Brief description of the narrator's voice (e.g., 'A neutral, third-person observer's voice')

ending_style.title: Ending Style
ending_style.description: Korean sentence ending style for narration (almost always )

protagonist_name.title: Protagonist Name
protagonist_name.description: The single most central character's name. If unclear, 'Protagonist'

narration_style.description: Style and endings for narrative text

golden_rule.title: Golden Rule
golden_rule.description: Overarching rule for the novel's feel and rhythm

NarrativeStyleDefinition.title: NarrativeStyleDefinition
NarrativeStyleDefinition.description: Core narrative style definition for the entire work.

PostSummary.title: PostSummary
PostSummary.description: Compact representation of a post for category overviews.

StyleAnalysisResponse.title: StyleAnalysisResponse
StyleAnalysisResponse.description: Response for style analysis - extends core NarrativeStyleDefinition

TaskExecutionListResponse.title: TaskExecutionListResponse
TaskExecutionListResponse.description: Response for list of task executions.

TaskExecutionResponse.title: TaskExecutionResponse
TaskExecutionResponse.description: Response model for task execution status.

source.title: Source
source.description: Source term in the source language
